div.div: Update on School Closures and Distance Learning

p.style: color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.3px;

span.style: color: rgb(65, 65, 65);;color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

br.p: We hope you are doing well and staying healthy. We would like to inform you that the decision has been made to continue with distance learning for the remainder of the school year to help preserve the health of our students, staff, families and community. Our decision was informed by direction from Governor Newsom, State Superintendent of Public Instruction Thurmond, and the Sonoma County Public Health Officer. All of the school districts in Sonoma County are doing the same.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

br.p: School buildings will remain closed and all instruction will be via distance learning.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

br.p: Meals for those in our community age 18 and under will continue to be distributed weekdays for the rest of the school year from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at Rancho Cotate High School, Technology Middle School, and Lawrence Jones Middle School. Children no longer need to be present for parents to be able to receive meals.
A special note for high school seniors:

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

br.p: The University of California announced that it will reduce certain admission requirements for incoming students for Fall 2020, including suspending the letter grade requirement for A-G courses completed in Winter, Spring and Summer 2020. They are also suspending the standardized test requirement for students applying for admission in Fall 2021.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

br.p: The California State University system is assessing whether it will suspend its testing requirement for admission, and we expect to hear its decision shortly.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

br.p: We know that the many activities that seniors look forward to may not be possible in the way expected. We understand the significance of commencement ceremonies and we are looking at many options to honor our graduating seniors. We dont know what tomorrow will bring, but we are keeping commencement top of mind.

We know that our staff and parents have many questions and we will provide information as soon as we receive it. While we make local plans, we are continually checking with the State Department of Education to ensure that we are aligned with changing State rules and regulations.

These are extraordinary times and we salute our staff for so quickly mobilizing for distance learning. We thank the members of our team who are serving behind-the-scenes to support the district from providing meals, to ensuring our technology functions properly, to keeping our facilities clean and safe. We also salute our parents and families who are helping their students the best way they can. We know this is an enormous challenge and we deeply appreciate your patience and support.

There is no substitute for a qualified teacher leading daily in-person instruction. Many parents are stressed about lessons, utilizing the technology, and wondering if they are doing enough. Please be kind to yourselves. Reach out to your teacher or principal because they are here to help. Some days will be more difficult than others, and sometimes its best to set aside the schoolwork for another day. We are in this together and we are committed to providing our students and families with a comprehensive system of supports. Thank you for your understanding.

p.span: Esperamos que est bien y que se mantenga saludable. Nos gustara informarle que se tom la decisin de continuar con la educacin a distancia durante el resto del ao escolar para ayudar a preservar la salud de nuestros estudiantes, personal, familias y comunidad. Nuestra decisin fue informada por la direccin del Gobernador Newsom, el Superintendente Estatal de Instruccin Pblica Thurmond y el Oficial de Salud Pblica del Condado de Sonoma. Todos los distritos escolares del condado de Sonoma estn haciendo lo mismo.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Los edificios escolares permanecern cerrados y toda la instruccin se realizar a distancia.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Las comidas para aquellos en nuestra comunidad de 18 aos y menores se seguirn distribuyendo entre semana durante el resto del ao escolar de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. en Rancho Cotate High School, Technology Middle School y Lawrence Jones Middle School. Los nios ya no necesitan estar presentes para que los padres puedan recibir comidas.
Una nota especial para estudiantes de ltimo ao de secundaria:

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: La Universidad de California anunci que reducir ciertos requisitos de admisin para los estudiantes entrantes para el otoo de 2020, incluida la suspensin del requisito de calificacin de letras para los cursos AG completados en invierno, primavera y verano de 2020. Tambin estn suspendiendo el requisito de examen estandarizado para los estudiantes que solicitan admisin en el otoo de 2021.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: El sistema de la Universidad Estatal de California est evaluando si suspender su requisito de prueba para la admisin, y esperamos escuchar su decisin en breve.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt 0.5in; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: -0.25in;

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: "Times New Roman";

p.span: Sabemos que las muchas actividades que esperan las personas mayores pueden no ser posibles de la manera esperada. Entendemos la importancia de las ceremonias de graduacin y estamos buscando muchas opciones para honrar a nuestros estudiantes de ltimo ao. No sabemos qu traer maana, pero estamos pensando en el comienzo.

Sabemos que nuestro personal y nuestros padres tienen muchas preguntas y proporcionaremos informacin tan pronto como la recibamos. Mientras hacemos planes locales, continuamente estamos verificando con el Departamento de Educacin del Estado para asegurarnos de que estamos alineados con las cambiantes reglas y regulaciones estatales.

Estos son tiempos extraordinarios y saludamos a nuestro personal por movilizarse tan rpidamente para el aprendizaje a distancia. Agradecemos a los miembros de nuestro equipo que estn sirviendo detrs del escenario para apoyar al distrito, desde proporcionar comidas, hasta garantizar que nuestra tecnologa funcione correctamente y mantener nuestras instalaciones limpias y seguras. Tambin saludamos a nuestros padres y familias que estn ayudando a sus estudiantes de la mejor manera posible. Sabemos que este es un desafo enorme y apreciamos profundamente su paciencia y apoyo.

No hay sustituto para un maestro calificado que dirija la instruccin diaria en persona. Muchos padres estn estresados por las lecciones, utilizan la tecnologa y se preguntan si estn haciendo lo suficiente. Por favor sean amables con ustedes mismos. Comunquese con su maestro o director porque estn aqu para ayudarlo. Algunos das sern ms difciles que otros, y a veces es mejor dejar de lado el trabajo escolar para otro da. Estamos juntos en esto y estamos comprometidos a proporcionar a nuestros estudiantes y familias un sistema integral de apoyo. Gracias por su comprensin.
